snippet: BREIDENBACH--Lester, Jr. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member and honorary trustee, Lester "Mickey" Breidenbach, Jr. and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
lead_paragraph: BREIDENBACH--Lester, Jr. We note with sorrow the passing of our longtime member and honorary trustee, Lester "Mickey" Breidenbach, Jr. and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
